allowedParameters.name: disableMinify
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to return minified or non minified Javascript links in layout information (for example disableMinify=true). Can only be used in Preview, ignored in Storefront.

allowedParameters.name: usePreviewData
allowedParameters.description: Boolean flag to determine whether to use preview data.

allowedParameters.name: layoutsRendered
allowedParameters.description: Contains the list of layout ids rendered on the client. If any id in it matches the requested page's layout id, then only region ids are returned.

allowedParameters.name: usePageId
allowedParameters.description: Use specific repository id for page, rather than the default.
